Many of us opt for chemical hair treatments to get the kind of hair that we desire. Be it straightening or perming
column13:
chemical treatments do damage our hair. Revitalize your chemically treated hair with the Ayurvedic Lily and Neroli Shampoo by Aromaz. This organic shampoo can also be used to reduce split ends.

Lily keeps your hair clean and refreshed.

column24:
this Aromaz shampoo prevents split ends and hair fall. The shampoo also leaves your hair with a pleasant Classic Spicy Aroma. Regain beautiful hair with this healing Aromaz Lily & Neroli Shampoo.

Directions for Use

  • Lather well and massage from root to tip.
  • Rinse thoroughly.
